name: An Icy Night In Snowman's Land - LD31 Edition
name_original: An Icy Night In Snowman's Land - LD31 Edition
description:
Help the snowman escape from the frozen lake in this puzzle game!

Use the arrow keys or WASD to move, and press R to restart if you get stuck.

The entire game was created in 48 hours for Ludum Dare 31.
